name: Buffer Overload Blocks (1 Hour Project)
description:
This game was developed for Weekly Hour Game Jam - W22 2017.

The theme was "0x00 Buffer Overflow".   Unsure of how to work that into a playable program, I created the most simple type of game involving "overflows" that there is: a falling blocks game.

The end result is really tough to play since 1 hour does not give much time to balance difficulty.

The entire game is played via the mouse.

Want to support my free games?  I sell merchandise featuring characters and designs from some of my most well received games. Every purchase helps me to not starve on my way to releasing my next game!
